description:
Sauron is a shapeshifter, but before he ever took the form of a werewolf, snake, vampire, or Annatar, Tolkien envisioned the character as something entirely different - a Cat!  Today, we cover the story of Tevildo, the Prince of Cats!

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Tevildo: When Sauron was a Cat | Tolkien Explained
